entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
